info.author: Philip Pavlik ppavlik@memphis.edu
info.abstract: The LearningCurveGraph component is an example of a(n) R component.
info.details: This component is used to visualize the graphical results of the LKT Analysis.
info.inputs: transaction file from LKT - LKT adds a model probability column. KC to be plotted for each subject - the graph is plotted for the repetitions of KCs, so the first value is the average proportion correct for the first time each student encounters each KC. frequency thrshold - For each graph, the proportion of transactions that trial N needs to be of trial 1 for it to be plotted. (Provides a cutoff as a proportion of the first trial N.)
info.outputs: Figures for the plot - the 2 panels are the the data before and after the longest time interval for each KC for each subject. The 2nd plot is a simple legend. Figures are numbered in the order of their attachemnt in the GUI.
